SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, TO_CHAR(UNIT_PRICE, 'FM999,999,999,999') UNIT_PRICE, CATEGORY_NO, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_SOLDOUT_FL, (SELECT POST_IMG_ADDRESS FROM POST_IMG PIMG WHERE PIMG.POST_NO = P.POST_NO AND POST_IMG_ORDER = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1) AS THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM POST P WHERE POST_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND POST_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND POST_SOLDOUT_FL = 0
ORDER BY POST_SOLDOUT_FL,
POST_VIEW DESC, POST_NO DESC
POST_NO DESC, POST_NO DESC
TO_NUMBER(UNIT_PRICE,'999999999999'), POST_NO DESC
TO_NUMBER(UNIT_PRICE,'999999999999') DESC, POST_NO DESC
